import './Body.css' import React from 'react' import Header from './Header' import SongRow from './SongRow' import { useDataLayerValue } from './DataLayer' import { Favorite, MoreHoriz, PlayCircleFilled } from '@material-ui/icons' function Body({spotify}) { const[{ discover_weekly },] = useDataLayerValue() return (
PLAYLIST

Discover Weekly

{discover_weekly?.description}

{discover_weekly?.tracks.items.map(item=> )}
) } export default Body
